sentences.sContent: At this age, you should be able to subtract one fraction from another.
sentences.sContent_eng: At this age, you should be able to subtract one fraction from another.
sentences.sCn: 在你这个年龄，你应该会演算分数减法了。

sentences.sContent: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result!
sentences.sContent_eng: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result!
sentences.sCn: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数！

sentences.sContent: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering a numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering a numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result.
sentences.sCn: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数。

phrases.pCn: 体积分率，体积分数；容积率
一小部分；一部分；零点几
空隙率；空隙分数；空隙组分
n. 克分子分数；摩尔分数

words.tran: 部分的；[数] 分数的，小数的

trans.tranOther: a part of a whole number in mathematics, such as ½ or ¾
